Ceano's Sharper Vanilla Sights
Replaces some of the sights with sharper versions.
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] Changes the reticles for the sights used by handguns, assault rifles, etc. [*] Changes the reticles for the sights used by the recurve bow. [*] Does not change the scope reticles for sniper rifles, or the reticle for the sight used by the LK-1018. [/list]
